languages.text: "Я был ее семьей. Учил и растил. Давал все, что имел сам. Разве не так, дочь?"
"I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"
languages.original_text: "Я был ее семьей. Учил и растил. Давал все, что имел сам. Разве не так, дочь?"

traits.locale_text: "I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"
"I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"
"I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"
"I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"
"I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"
"I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"

languages.text: « C'est moi qui suis devenu sa famille. Je l'ai élevée et éduquée. Je lui ai donné tout ce que j'avais. N'est-ce pas, ma fille ? »
languages.original_text: "I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est moi qui suis devenu sa famille. Je l'ai élevée et éduquée. Je lui ai donné tout ce que j'avais. N'est-ce pas, ma fille ? »

languages.text: «Pero es que sí he sido su familia. La vi crecer y la eduqué. Le di todo lo que tengo. ¿No es así, hija mía?».
languages.original_text: "I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"

traits.locale_text: «Pero es que sí he sido su familia. La vi crecer y la eduqué. Le di todo lo que tengo. ¿No es así, hija mía?».

languages.text: 「私は彼女の家族でした。彼女を育てて教えた。彼女に全てを与えました。そうだろう、娘よ？」
languages.original_text: "I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は彼女の家族でした。彼女を育てて教えた。彼女に全てを与えました。そうだろう、娘よ？」

languages.text: “曾经的我就是她的家人。我把她抚养成人，将知识传授给他。我把我拥有的一切都给了她，没错吧，我的女儿？”
languages.original_text: "I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"

traits.locale_text: “曾经的我就是她的家人。我把她抚养成人，将知识传授给他。我把我拥有的一切都给了她，没错吧，我的女儿？”

languages.text: "Ich war ihre Familie. Ich habe sie großgezogen und unterrichtet. Ich habe ihr alles gegeben, was ich hatte. Nicht wahr, meine Tochter?"
languages.original_text: "I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich war ihre Familie. Ich habe sie großgezogen und unterrichtet. Ich habe ihr alles gegeben, was ich hatte. Nicht wahr, meine Tochter?"

languages.text: "Ben onun ailesiydim. Onu yetiştirip eğittim. Elimdeki her şeyi onunla paylaştım. Öyle değil mi kızım?"
languages.original_text: "I was her family. I raised her and taught her. I gave her everything I had. Did I not, my daughter?"
